column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " It 's over .
#Text=My instincts tell me he would n't go too far .
#Text=He would have a secret bunker ; somewhere he could go and be safe during the siege but still be close enough to lead his nation .
#Text=" Toph says : " If it 's an underground secret bunker we 're looking for , I 'm just the girl to find it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " The mechanist gave me this timing device .
#Text=It looks like we 've got about ten minutes until the full eclipse .
#Text=Ten minutes to find the Fire Lord .
#Text=" Aang says : " We can still do this .
#Text=We can still win the day .
#Text=" Katara says : " Wait !
#Text=If they knew we were coming it could all be a trap .
#Text=Maybe we should use the time we have left to make sure we all get out of here safely .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Everyone who 's here today came prepared to risk everything for this mission .
#Text=They know what 's at stake .
#Text=If there 's still a chance and there 's still hope , I think they would want Aang to go for it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What do you think ?
#Text=You 're the one that has to face the Fire Lord .
#Text=Whatever you decide , I 'm with you .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 've got ta try .
#Text="
